containers.info.name: Dim_Wallet_Ng

containers.info.name: dim_prefix
containers.info.extract.query: select number_prefix_key, number_prefix_cd, destination_descr_txt, mnp_cd, competitor_ind, landline_ind, premium_number_ind, special_number_ind, network_cd, network_nm, country_cd, country_nm, on_net_ind, destination_group_txt, continent_cd, continent_name_txt, current_record_ind, record_start_dt, record_end_dt, record_force_source, batch_id, destination_cd, international_ind, voicemail_ind, free_call_ind, exact_match_ind, in_use_ind, create_dt, flex_1_txt, flex_2_txt, flex_3_txt, flex_4_txt, flex_5_txt, flex_6_txt, flex_7_txt, flex_8_txt, flex_9_txt, marketing_ind from flare_8.dim_prefix

containers.info.name: hsdp_lookup
containers.info.extract.query: select opco_name, partner_name, partner_id, service_name, service_id, product_name, product_id, status, product_type, sms_access_code, ussd_access_code, opt_in_keyword, subsciption_fee, opt_out_keyword, on_demand_fee, product_online_date, total_subscriptions, on_demand_request, service_category, service_sub_category, product_category, finance_category from flare_8.vp_hsdp_lookup_new

containers.info.name: Operators
containers.info.extract.query: select seqnum, allottee, area, area_code, access_code, range_start, numberrange_start, range_end, numberrange_end, network_code, correct_shortname, pmrated_name, length from flare_8.operators

containers.info.name: MNP_PORTING_BROADCAST
containers.info.extract.query: select  msisdn_ky, donor_id, recipient_id, date_time_stamp as date_time_stamp, cast(date_format(date_parse(date_format(from_unixtime(date_time_stamp/ 1000),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'%Y%m%d') as int) as action_date, file_name, file_offset, kamanja_loaded_date, file_mod_date, date_key, event_timestamp_enrich, original_timestamp_enrich from flare_8.mnp_porting_broadcast
